features: Garnier Micellar Cleansing Water for Waterproof Makeup: Use this gentle yet powerful makeup remover to remove stubborn waterproof makeup; Safe for use in the eye area, and for removing longwear lipsticks, while leaving skin clean and refreshed, never dry

Micellar Water is effective yet gentle; It's simple, micellar cleansing water lifts away dirt, makeup, and excess oil, all in just a few swipes; No rinsing, no harsh rubbing just refreshed skin, and a face washed clean and cleared of impurities
Remove tough makeup even the leading wipes can’t, leaves less waterproof mascara residue. Use Waterproof Micellar Cleansing Water plus Reusable Eco Pads.

Garnier SkinActive was developed with gentle formulas and naturally derived ingredients to leave your skin looking fresh and healthy, no matter your skin type, Find the face wash, moisturizer, makeup remover, or mask for you
body.description: This All-in-1 Micellar Cleansing Water is surprisingly powerful yet gentle to skin. It effectively removes even waterproof makeup, cleanses and refreshes skin. A multi-purpose cleanser that contains Micellar technology. Like a magnet, micelles capture and lift away dirt, oil and makeup without harsh rubbing, leaving skin perfectly clean and refreshed without over-drying. • All-in-1 cleanser and makeup remover, cleanses, removes even waterproof makeup and refreshes skin • Oil-Free, Alcohol-Free, Fragrance-Free • Micelle Technology attracts dirt, oil and makeup like a magnet without harsh rubbing • All skin types, even sensitive TO REMOVE EYE MAKEUP: Hold pad over closed eyes for a few seconds, then gently wipe without harsh rubbing. TO CLEAN SKIN & REMOVE FACE MAKEUP: Gently wipe all over until skin is completely clean from makeup and impurities. Use daily, AM/PM. No need to rinse. Avoid contact with eyes. If contact occurs, rinse thoroughly with water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This product will clean most things off your skin. Very gentle. Even takes eye make-up off.
reviews.reviewText: Great product. Will take off even black eye make-up. Leaves a nice moist surface.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Makeup Remover
reviews.reviewText: Love, love, LOVE this Micellar Water. It takes off my makeup so easily, even my waterproof makeup. It leaves me skin feeling fresh and clean. I have very sensitive skin and it doesn’t irritate it at all. Big win! And it’s well priced.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff!
reviews.reviewText: I use this as my facial cleaner in the morning and I love it. It also removes makeup also, so sometimes I’ll use it before bed if I don’t feel like doing a full facial wash. I love it because it’s so lightweight, doesn’t tingle or burn (literally feels like water), doesn’t dehydrate my skin and doesn’t leave a film. I’ve bought this several times now because it’s a must need in my skin care routine!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Melts make up instantly
reviews.reviewText: My holy grail product that melts make up away instantly! It literally wipes off even waterproof make up like a dream. It doesn't require excessive rubbing, which is perfect for someone who wears make up everyday and wants to avoid wrinkles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to move away from using make-up wipes as often to remove my eye make-up so I bought this and some soft cloths. I am impressed with this product. I have sensitive eyes/allergies and this doesn't affect them too much when I get a little in my eyes. I am not saying this doesn't take any effort to remove all the eye make-up but even the wipes do. I shake the bottle, squeeze some on a soft cloth, use it on one eye, then get another part of the cloth wet with water and wipe my eye again; repeat for other eye. If you have a lot of make-up on it may take a little back and forth of these steps, especially with the type of cloth I am using. I need to experiment with different cloths I think. Thinner may work better but I chose a thicker, softer cloth so my sensitive eye skin would not be aggravated.This does seem oily although they do not say there is oil in the product. I don't see a problem with this although if you plan to use it on your entire face and break out easily, I would test it first in an area.An interesting discovery with this product is that it also works on other substances you may get on yourself that soap will not easily remove. I was spray painting a bunch of items and multiple times got dark spray paint on my legs or hands. I tried this product with a cotton ball and it removed the paint with little effort! I was pretty impressed and it goes to show it can remove mascara if it can remove spray paint! I plan to continue to use this product and would recommend it as long as you are aware that it does feel oily and you do need to shake it each time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars LIFECHANGING - never buying make up wipes again.
reviews.reviewText: I have always used make up wipes to take off make up since I use waterproof mascara. I could never find anything else that works. Make up wipes are about half a dollar per unit which is a lot. This product is amazing. It takes off all of my make up with ease and is well worth the money. The bottle last over 3 months and I use it everyday. Will never buy a different make up remover!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, very pleasant to use
reviews.reviewText: I tried Garnier Micellular water when I ran out of witch hazel astringent. I really like this product. It leaves my face feeling clean, soft and comfortable. No more uncomfortable, dry feeling after using. It cleans makeup off and gets you ready to wash your face. Good practice to use a Micellular water first and then wash with a cleanser and water.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like this as a makeup remover, but I always wash my face afterwards as it leave me feeling a little oily

reviews.reviewTitle: my go to make up remover for 5+ years
reviews.reviewText: Garnier SkinActive Micellar Cleansing Water All-in-1 Cleanser & Waterproof Makeup Remover has been a staple in my skincare routine for over five years, and it continues to impress. Its effectiveness in removing waterproof makeup is unmatched, effortlessly tackling even the most stubborn products. I made the mistake of trying the variant with the pink top (which is not the same), only to promptly return to this trusted blue-topped bottle.One of the standout features is its gentleness on the skin. I've never experienced any breakouts or irritations from using this micellar water, granted that I follow up with a face wash afterward. This product has rightfully earned its place as my go-to makeup remover, consistently delivering reliable results without compromising on skin health. The small size makes it even more convenient for traveling, adding an extra layer of practicality to its already impressive qualities. If you're in search of a dependable and skin-friendly makeup remover that's travel-friendly, look no further—this Garnier Micellar Water is a true winner.

Garnier Waterproof Micellar Water is a lifesaver for those who wear stubborn waterproof makeup. As someone who has struggled to find an effective makeup remover that can tackle waterproof products, I was thrilled to discover this product.First and foremost, the micellar water is incredibly effective at removing even the most stubborn waterproof makeup. It effortlessly dissolves and lifts away makeup, leaving no traces behind. It saves me the hassle of scrubbing or tugging at my eyes or face, as it effortlessly removes every bit of mascara, foundation, and long-wearing lipstick.What sets this micellar water apart is its gentle formula. It is specifically designed to be tough on waterproof makeup but gentle on the skin. It doesn't leave my skin feeling dry, tight, or irritated like some other makeup removers. Instead, it feels refreshing and soothing, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.I also appreciate the convenience of the packaging. The bottle has a secured flip-top cap that prevents any accidental spills or leaks, which is perfect for travel or on-the-go use. Additionally, the product lasts a long time as a little goes a long way. Just a few swipes on a cotton pad is enough to remove all traces of makeup.Another great feature of this micellar water is that it doesn't leave any greasy residue. After use, my skin feels clean and refreshed, and I can go on with my skincare routine without any concerns of leftover product interfering with other products.Overall, Garnier Waterproof Micellar Water has become a staple in my skincare routine. It effectively removes waterproof makeup while being gentle on the skin. Its convenient packaging and non-greasy formula make it a go-to choice for hassle-free makeup removal. I highly recommend giving it a try.

reviews.reviewText: After using another waterproof eye makeup up remover I used for rest of face as didn’t seem to take off waterproof mascara or long lasting LippySlight “ soapish “ feelbottle large but for travelling no goodBut not bad
